about_the_game:
Get a jump-start into 8BitMMO and support development with this pack! Receive 2,100 gold and 15 platinum as well as an exclusive hat.



After you have purchased a Steam Founder's pack, please restart the game launcher for the game to detect the purchase.
detailed_description:
Get a jump-start into 8BitMMO and support development with this pack! Receive 2,100 gold and 15 platinum as well as an exclusive hat.



After you have purchased a Steam Founder's pack, please restart the game launcher for the game to detect the purchase.
legal_notice: 8BitMMO Copyright 2001-2015 Archive Entertainment.  ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: You should get one of the laptops with the glowing logo on the back, because I'm pretty sure that makes it go faster.

name: 8BitMMO - Steam Founder's Pack Basic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics is fine, or really any wire and tin foil you can cobble together that looks like a GPU.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: If you don't have one, just make beep & boop noises with your mouth when appropriate.
  • Additional Notes: You can probably get this to run on a toaster.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i5/i7 processor (Fast CPUs allow lighting to render)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Get a jump-start into 8BitMMO and support development with this pack! Receive 2,100 gold and 15 platinum as well as an exclusive hat.
